title: Sony Xperia XZ2 vs Xperia XZ2 Compact: What’s the difference? | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()## **Sony XZ2 vs XZ2 Compact value – What’s the price difference?**At the time of writing, Sony hasn’t announced pricing details for eitherdevice. But going on previous launches, the XZ2 Compact will be priced lowerthan its larger sibling. We’ll provide an update once we have confirmedpricing.## **Sony XZ2 vs XZ2 Compact – verdict**We have to applaud Sony for sticking to its guns and pushing the Xperia XZ2Compact as a true small flagship, rather than just sticking in some lower-endcomponents. It doesn’t quite have all the features of the XZ2, but it’s close.**Related:[Best Samsung Galaxy S9deals](https://www.trustedreviews.com/deals/best-samsung-galaxy-s9-deals-3402357)**The company’s decision to switch up the design is most welcome, and there areplenty of features included in both of these phones that could make it a goodpick. We’d also guess that the devices will come in cheaper than [SamsungGalaxy S9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-s9) and[iPhone 8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/iphone-8), although unlikelyat the [OnePlus 5T](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/oneplus-5t) price.
